summary:
I'm a finance consultant with 15 years of expertise implementing Infor M3 and Oracle EBS consulting solutions in Australia, the United States, Malaysia, Indonesia, the Solomon Islands, Myanmar, China, and Sri Lanka.

Implementations, resource augmentations, bespoke work packages, system integrations, presales, training, and application support are all part of my background.

My current focus is Infor M3 financial accounting and controlling, which necessitates understanding of both financial and non-financial streams, as well as M3 technology.
